titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2686) to amend the Public Works and Economic Development Act of 1965 and the Appalachian Regional Development Act of 1965.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-268.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 8/4/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2686 (regional economic development).
